recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of shrimp, peeled and deveined| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of flour| Quantity; 2; Prepare 2 eggs, beaten| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of coconut flakes| Measurement; 100; Measure out 100 grams of panko bread crumbs| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of cooking spray| Untimed; None; Preheat the air fryer to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Set up a breading station with flour, beaten eggs, and a mixture of coconut flakes, panko bread crumbs, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Dredge shrimp in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat with the coconut mixture| Untimed; None; Lightly spray the air fryer basket with cooking spray| Untimed; None; Arrange shrimp in a single layer in the air fryer basket| Untimed; None; Lightly spray the shrimp with cooking spray| Timed; 600; Cook in the preheated air fryer for 10 minutes, flipping halfway through| Finish; None; Serve hot with your favorite dipping sauce!
title: Air Fryer Coconut Shrimp
